name: CATTACK !
description:
You're the only hope against a Cat-astrophic invasion. Use your Lazer vision to stop this takeover and teach a lesson to these Fur-ious felines.

A funny VR experience full of action !

Made with love by :
Jimmy Vuidart - game design & development
Julien Klaer - game design & development
Jérôme Lartillot - game design , developement & graphics
Maxime Barnier - game design, sound design & graphics (maximebarnier.com / bestmornings.tumblr.com)
